pullRequest.title: Issue 17843 programatic pool config
pullRequest.bodyText:
With these changes:

A datasource can be initialized using any of these ways (precedence order matters):

db.properties in the WEB-INF/classes folder
System environments
Docker secrets
context.xml in the META-INF folder as always



For further information about how to configure a datasource, please refer to #17843

The datasource is always saved in JNDI to continue supporting JNDIUtil.lookup(ctx, Constants.DATABASE_DEFAULT_DATASOURCE); and this call https://github.com/dotCMS/core/blob/master/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotmarketing/startup/runalways/Task00030ClusterInitialize.java#L26
